about_the_game: "Abandoning Spies" is a captivating Metroidvania adventure where you step into the role of Agent Pierce. Traverse an intricately connected world filled with peril and intrigue. Employ advanced movement techniques, enhance your gunplay skills, and delve into an enigmatic underworld crime story that's far from simple. With inspiration from characters Lazzy, Jasper, and Claire shaping your skill trees, you'll piece together the puzzle and unearth the truth behind the shadows. Can you save the world from this looming threat?
